instance-variables.name: Sorcerer's Cap
instance-variables.description: Its size covers your eyes, making you appear menacing. +35% Skill Damage and stuns affect everyone on the map.

instance-variables.name: Book of Enlightenment
instance-variables.description: Book with an LED light inside. +20% Skill Damage and allows scorching bullet to penetrate more.

instance-variables.name: Holy Chalice
instance-variables.description: The chalice was once used to hold some yellow liquid. +25% Skill Damage and allows the mage to recover health.

instance-variables.name: Hourglass of Fate
instance-variables.description: Contains the sands of Boracay Beach. +30% Skill Damage and decreases all cooldown significantly.

instance-variables.name: Catalyst of Magic
instance-variables.description: A gallstone from a former Sage. +40% Skill Damage and increases Fireball AOE.

instance-variables.name: Level Up
instance-variables.description: Increase damage of auto attack, skills, and decreases all cooldown time a bit.
